data.text: @LucindaLakes @Cannydoode @DalbidEU Yes, out of a population of 66 million people the racist idiots picked the worst possible man for the worst possible time, bugger 😕

@DalbidEU Why oh why do we have this useless Idiot 
 running our country at this dangerous time ? Dear God please help us #johnsonout44

@DalbidEU Boris is looking newly invigorated and perky, isn't he? Must be because a convenient war has popped up to distract people from his lies, corruption and incompetence and that of his government. But we haven't forgotten, and when the war is over, he'll still have charges to answer.
@DalbidEU A crisis is a good time to ditch the PM. . https://t.co/22W8HTGe6r
